title: 2 seat bench seat with arm rest

posts.content:
2 seat bench seat with arm rest. Single fixed. Arm rest to the right as it faces the front. Requires new covering though solid and complete. I have no real idea what its worth other than what ive reviewed. Will go for over Â£1000 from what ive seen. I wouldnt pay that myself. Im sure some guys on here will put me right. Offers welcome. Photo to follow.
Regards

Hey there,
can you send me some pictures at tggwtb@gmail.com. Where is the seat bench located?
